name: Owl-Warrior0.1
description:
Hello, welcome to Owl-Warrior0.1.

In the final version of the game, you will be running & jumping through the ruins of an ancient forest kingdom, in order to collect the treasure buried within to help with the construction of your village.

Currently there is only the Owl-Warrior, & a test area for jumping, animation, & collisions.

In the next version you will be able to play with explosives, destructible objects, & more in-depth platforming.

Currently in terms of issues there is only three animations (Jump, Walk, & Idle), there is nothing to prevent players from falling into the abyss, & there is a wall jump glitch that shall be turned into an actual feature in Owl-Warrior0.2. There is also currently no exit button.
